title: SubZero League Team LF1M (ADC) High Diamond+

embed.description: The latest Tweets from SubZero eSports Club (@SubZeroESC). Gaming Organisation based in Australia | email contactsubzeroinfo@gmail.com | Current teams in RL, CSGO, Starcraft and Battlerite. Australia

body:
Subzero eSports is a quickly growing and already thriving eSports organisation with high skilled and successful teams in some of the other large eSports scenes. (Counter Strike Global Offensive, Overwatch, Rocket League and League of Legends) Our newest team which is the League Team has been going sturdy for a decent amount of time until the ADC decided to step down from League in general. The team already has high amounts of experience and have a coach and an analyst already on board, which will ensure their constant rise to OCS. 

The current lineup for the team is 
Ldkskillz - mid
Lm so Sorry - Top 
iNS Beefybill (c)  - Support
Coach Nathan - Jungle

They all individually and together have endless amounts experience and skills to push forward results. They are looking for a well experienced and confident adc that will fit their team's playstyle and is also reliable in all stages of the game and proficient on a wide set of different champions. 

Applications for the positions will be done in the following format:
Summmoner Name (Display name in LoL/Op.gg):
Age:
Current Rank:
Season 6 Rank:
Experience:
Availability during the week (general week):

Contact either: 
AusGhost
AusGhosthd@gmail.com or add me on league AusGhost or add me on steam http://steamcommunity.com/id/AusGhost/

Beefybill
League IGN name: iNS Beefybill

Coach Kr Mentels 
League IGN name: Kr Mentels

~Cheers
